page.title: 02The Green Telephone Box
page.content:
Yattendon is the only village with a green telphone box. There is a great story to that. One day a man from British Telecom came and painted the telphone box red,but in the night somebody painted it green. In the morning , everyone stopped their cars in amazement. They said to each other "I thought they painted that red!" If you look closely you can see chips out of the paint,and you can see the red paint underneath. That's the story of the green telephone box.
Yatttendon is unusual in that most of the village and a great deal of the surrounding land is owned by one man, {Lord Iliffe.}He used to live in Yattendon Court but when the M4 motorway was built in 1971 he moved to Basildon.
